# {.tabset}
## The full model {.tabset}

<font size="5"> 1. Level 1</font> 

<center> <h1> Y~ij~ = $\beta$~0j~ +  $\beta$~1j~X~ij~ + e~ij~</h1> </center>

<font size="5"> 2. Level 2 intercept</font> 

<center> <h1> $\beta$~0j~ = $\gamma$~00~ +  $\gamma$~01~W~j~ + U~0j~</h1> </center>

<font size="5"> 3. Level 2 slope</font> 

<center> <h1> $\beta$~1j~ =  $\gamma$~10~ +  $\gamma$~11~W~j~ + U~1j~</h1> </center>

<font size="5">4. Combined model</font> 
 
<center> <h1> Y~ij~ =  $\gamma$~00~ + $\gamma$~10~X~ij~ + $\gamma$~01~W~j~ +  $\gamma$~11~W~j~X~ij~ + U~1j~X~ij~ + U~0j~ + e~ij~</h1> </center>


## The null model {.tabset}

<font size="5"> 1. Level 1</font> 
<center> <h1> Y~ij~ = $\beta$~0j~ +   e~ij~</h1> </center>

<font size="5"> 2. Level 2 intercept</font> 
<center> <h1> $\beta$~0j~ = $\gamma$~00~ +  U~0j~</h1> </center>
